conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a musical movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Sure! Here are some musical movies that you might enjoy:

  * La La Land (2016) - A musical romance set in Los Angeles.
  * Mamma Mia! (2008) - A musical comedy film based on the jukebox musical of the same name.
  * Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again (2011) - A musical comedy sequel to Mamma Mia! (2008).
  * The Greatest Showman (2017) - A biographical musical film about P.T. Barnum, an American showman and entrepreneur.

  * Chicago (1975) - A musical drama film directed by Bob Fosse.
  * Les Misérables (1998) - A historical musical film based on the novel of the same name by Victor Hugo.
  * Grease (1978) - A musical comedy film directed by John De Meis.
  * West Side Story (1961) - An American musical drama film directed by Jerome Robbins and Robert Wise.
  * Moulin Rouge! (2001) - A musical romantic drama film directed by Baz Luhrmann.

  * Rocketman (2015) - A biographical musical film directed by Adam Scott, Dan Fogelman, and Michael Schleier based on the life ofElton John.
  .


And if you have any other questions or preferences related to musical movies, feel free to ask!
